Dialogue: The little one there has a broken feather. It’s not getting any food...
Look, it's pecking bread from my hand!
The birds are always by this bench. Is that because they're waiting for you to feed them?
I don't know. I don't think they'd remember me.
Birds have really good memories for faces. And your face is kind. I think they like you.
Next time I come by, could we feed them together? I could bring seeds.
I... I guess that’d be fine.
Then I'll be back tomorrow! I can't wait.
